core:action.core:comment: Creates a temporary copy of the tender item on which we perform the tests by creating dummy change items. The temporary tender item is discarded when the process exits.
Dummy Action which exists solely to add search postcode privilege to the process, and thus role maintenance.

core:assignAction.core:comment: Initialise NotCaptureName and NotCaptureAddress, these are not normally set, if they are not set then assume capture required
